title: Moscow Theater Festival
text: This poster was produced for the Vsevolod Meyerhold State Theater at Moscow towards 1933. The festival productions ranged from Alexander Ostrovsky's The Forrest and Nikolai Gogol's The Inspector General to Alexandre Dumas's The Lady with Camelias. The black background is typical in Victor Shestakov's designs.
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
